item.description:
Hopkinton State Park includes the picturesque Hopkinton Reservoir. The park offers a variety of year round recreational activities including 2 life guarded swimming beaches, stocked fishing, 12 tree shaded, first come first served, picnic areas (300 picnic tables and 165 charcoal cooking grills), 10 miles of marked trails, open field space and a concrete boat launching ramp for non-motorized watercraft. Outdoor Recreation of Hopkinton Inc. provides seasonal boat rentals (508) 435-3965. Public restrooms are available.

This 'outdoor event' will be a Potluck. Please bring something to share. Also bring your lawn chair. We can swim at the beach there, go kayaking (Renting the kayaks cost $15 per hour), hike the many trails, play cards or board games on the picnic tables (bring whatever you have) and just simply have a wonderful outdoor day with lots of laughs!

This event is open to members and their friends.

Bad weather cancels this event

 



AUTO PARKING IS $5 PER CAR (some of you might want to carpool).

NOT ALLOWED: •Ground fires and wood fires (cooking fires of charcoal or propane are allowed in designated areas only) •Swimming at unsupervised beaches •Littering •Alcohol •Gasoline powered watercraft on Hopkinton Reservoir •Motorized vehicles on trails •Floatation devices

.

Where to find us---Enter toll booth upon entering park.

Take FIRST immediate RIGHT (believe it is called Ash St) and follow winding road down to (on right side) Marina where the boats are. Go a few feet past this and park in lot (on right side) just after Marina & boats. Look out onto the water from the parking lot and I'll be there in front of the water at the picnic tables- with a rainbow umbrella . ((They do not accept reservations it is first come first serve.  The person planning will be there at 10 am when the park opens. 

If spot in front of lot (next to Marina is taken) She will get the spots at the end of this parking lot.

Updates and cell phone to follow for yes RSVPs.







Event starts at 11 am but come down any time.
item.how_to_find_us: look for Rainbow Umbrella - more details below.
item.name: Potluck Picnic at Hopkinton State Park
